name: opsrsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0

stmt.origin: eqtrd(c0, cfv(csca, c1), cfv(csca, c2), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c2))
⊣ (w0 →(Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c2))
⊣ (w0 →(Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1))

stmt.origin: psrsca(c0, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)
stmt.pretty: psrsca(c0, c2, c3, c5, c6, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(c3[mPwSer]c0)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →(Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ c2 =(c3[mPwSer]c0)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)

stmt.origin: opsrbaslem(csca, c2, c1, c3, c0, c4, nat5, w0)
stmt.pretty: opsrbaslem(csca, c2, c1, c3, c0, c4, nat5, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c3, copws, c0), c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c3, c3)))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wbr(nat5, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ c2 =(c3[mPwSer]c0)
⊣ c1 =((c3[ordPwSer]c0)` c4)
⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆(c3 × c3))
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 5[<]cdc(1, 0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c3, copws, c0), c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c3, c3)))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wbr(nat5, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(Scalar ` c1))
⊣ c2 =(c3[mPwSer]c0)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
⊣ c1 =((c3[ordPwSer]c0)` c4)
⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆(c3 × c3))
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 5[<]cdc(1, 0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c3, copws, c0), c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c3, c3)))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wbr(nat5, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c3, copws, c0), c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c3, c3)))
-| wbr(nat5, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmps, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c3, copws, c0), c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c3, c3)))

comment: The scalar ring of the ordered power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
